title: 2024 Bell 505 For Sale In Louisiana USA (N505DF)
short_description: Introducing one of the cleanest Bell 505s on the market today. Located in New Iberia, Louisiana, this 2024 Bell 505 has only 85 hours since new & has been meticulously maintained by its original U.S.-based owner. With the remaining Bell factory warranty & all maintenance logs available digitally, this helicopter offers peace of mind alongside performance.
long_description:
Description

Finished in a sleek Gunmetal Grey with high skid gear & Solar Advantage windows, it pairs bold aesthetics with practical enhancements like air conditioning with a 3rd evaporator, automatic door openers & an inlet barrier filter. The interior is equally refined, featuring premium black leather seats, coinmat carpet & four-point harnesses throughout.

Avionics include the Garmin G1000-based GDU 1050H with HTAWS & Synthetic Vision, a GFC 600H 3-axis autopilot, radar altimeter, traffic advisory system & FlightStream 510 for seamless connectivity.

Whether you’re flying privately or building a commercial fleet, this helicopter delivers outstanding value & turnkey readiness.

Contact us today if you’d like the full spec sheet or to arrange a showing.

title: 1998 McDonnell Douglas 600N For Sale In New York USA (N600ES)
short_description: **Price Reduced To $899,000.** Sellacopter is thrilled to offer this 1998 MD 600N – a versatile & reliable aircraft from MD Helicopters, a brand known for its enduring presence in the industry. The MD 600N has proven to be an exceptional platform for utility operators, tour companies & private owners alike.
long_description:
Description

This helicopter has had only two owners since new & has been meticulously maintained by professional technicians throughout its life. This helicopter just had a fresh annual & NOTAR Straps replaced July 2025. With a total airframe & engine time of just 1,655.9 hours, it remains a low-time aircraft in great condition. The current owner, having personally flown the aircraft for over 1,000 hours, is selling due to expanding business demands, which leaves little time for flight operations. As a result, the helicopter is ready & available for immediate sale to a new owner.

Whether you’re a private enthusiast seeking the unique thrill of flying a NOTAR-equipped MD helicopter or a utility operator needing the robust capabilities of the 600N for your mission, this aircraft is an excellent fit. With its highly motivated seller, this MD 600N is priced competitively, offering outstanding value.

Full scan records are available upon request & the aircraft is located in Islip, Long Island, New York, ready for showings.

Don’t miss out on this opportunity to own a reliable, well-maintained MD 600N!

AIRCRAFT
Year: 1998
Make: MD
Model: 600N
Engine: Rolls Royce 250-C47M
AFTTSN: 1,655.9 Hours
ETTSN: 1,655.9 Hours

AVIONICS
Garmin GMX-200 MFD
Garmin GNS530 NAV/COM
Bendix King KY196A COM2
Garmin GTX330 Transponder
PMA7000H Audio Panel

EQUIPMENT
Standard Equipment

The high-tech flight deck makes flying simple & fun, while the reliable drivetrain & rotor system give you confidence every time you lift off. Inside, the large cabin offers plenty of legroom & headroom for comfort on every trip – all in a cost-competitive, top-performing helicopter.

title: 1989 Eurocopter Bo 105 CBS-4 For Sale In Florida USA (N8199J)
short_description: Aviation Sales International is proud to present this distinctive 1989 Eurocopter BO105CBS-4—a true icon in the world of light twin-engine helicopters. With its legendary agility & full aerobatic capability, this helicopter delivers an exhilarating flight experience reminiscent of the famous Red Bull display team. Whether you’re an enthusiast looking to own a unique piece of aviation history or seeking twin-turbine performance at a remarkably accessible price point, this BO105 offers exceptional value—twin-turbine ownership for the cost of a Robinson.
long_description:
Description

This helicopter is powered by a pair of reliable Rolls-Royce 250-C20B engines. Engine #1 shows 7,015.2 total hours with 1,440.8 hours since overhaul, while Engine #2 has 12,114.9 hours total time & 2,217 hours since overhaul. The airframe has accumulated 4,780.7 total hours & has just completed a fresh annual inspection. New TT straps have been installed & all Airworthiness Directives are current, ensuring this aircraft is turn-key and ready for immediate operations.

Equipped with a dependable avionics suite, this BO105 includes a King digital 165 Nav/Comm, Garmin GNS 530 GPS/NAV/COM, Garmin GTX 330 transponder &a Garmin 340 audio panel, providing solid situational awareness & navigation capability for both VFR & IFR conditions.

Combining Eurocopter engineering with aerobatic performance, a robust maintenance status & a well-rounded avionics package, this BO105CBS-4 is a rare opportunity for those looking to own & fly a true classic with unmatched versatility & flair.

Smooth flying like new helicopter.

With only 1,088 hours since new, this VIP-configured twin-engine helicopter is a rare opportunity for discerning operators seeking luxury, safety & proven performance in a mid-size rotorcraft.
long_description:
Description

This Bell 430 is equipped with a comprehensive avionics suite, including dual Garmin GPS 500, dual AFCS with 4-tube EFIS, Honeywell KTA 870 TAS, WX Radar ART 2000, L3 Stormscope & dual PAC-24 audio panels, among many others. The aircraft offers the latest situational awareness & safety enhancements expected from a professionally maintained IFR platform. It also features a co-pilot EFIS station & an integrated moving map display for improved mission versatility.

Configured with a five-place VIP Quietzone interior & enhanced with high-visibility paint, cabin intercom, dual Bose headsets & forward pulse lighting, this aircraft ensures both comfort & operational effectiveness. Additional equipment includes a rotor brake, particle separators, heated windshield, retractable landing gear, SAT phone, XM radio & cargo hook provisions — reflecting the aircraft’s capability for a variety of missions, from corporate transport to special utility operations.

Both Rolls-Royce 250-C40B engines & all dynamic components show low time & are in excellent condition. The helicopter benefits from a fresh annual inspection & is currently operating under Part 91 private use, fully current & ready for immediate delivery.

Located in the United States & offered with optional management & operational support, this Bell 430 stands as a premier option for buyers looking for a turn-key solution in the twin-engine VIP helicopter market.

title: 2007 Eurocopter EC120B For Sale In Florida USA (N822ET)
short_description: This helicopter represents a unique opportunity for discerning buyers looking for a dependable, modernised EC120 with excellent pedigree & tasteful updates. The seller is knowledgeable & prepared to assist in closing & delivery logistics.
long_description:
Description

N822ET is a highly upgraded & meticulously maintained Airbus EC120B Colibri, representing one of the cleanest examples on the market today. With a fresh April 2025 annual inspection & a long list of avionics, interior & cosmetic upgrades, this helicopter is fully turnkey & ideal for private or commercial operations. Whether for VIP transport, utility or leisure flying, N822ET offers a rare combination of performance, style & reliability.

‍Recent Upgrades & Features
Garmin G500 Glass Panel.
Fully integrated PFD/MFD system providing modern situational awareness with synthetic vision, terrain, traffic & engine monitoring.
Garmin GTN 750 GPS/NAV/COMM.
Touchscreen WAAS GPS with integrated NAV/COMM, traffic overlay & advanced navigation capability. ADS-B compliant.
New SOKKIA Pitot-Static System.
Professionally installed new socket pitot-static system for accurate airspeed & altitude readings. Fully compliant & recently tested.

Interior Refurbishment
Brand-new front pilot & co-pilot seating, reupholstered in high-quality materials.
New custom-fitted floor covering for durability & aesthetic appeal.
New headliner gives the cabin a clean, quiet & refined interior atmosphere.

Exterior & Paint
Recently repainted tail boom & touch-ups across the aircraft. The paint presents extremely well in person & shows pride of ownership. Trump Force 2.
Customs Entry Letter Provided.

Remarks
N822ET is fully cleared with U.S. Customs & includes the proper documentation to ensure smooth cross-border transactions & operation.
Recent Annual Inspection.
The helicopter underwent a full annual inspection in April 2025 with no airworthiness issues. All logbooks are up to date & organized.

title: New 2024 Robinson R44 Raven II Turbine Helicopter For Sale
short_description: The Robinson R44 – four seat helicopter is the most popular helicopter in the world today. Over 3,000 R44 helicopters have been sold. The Robinson R44 Raven II is the latest derivative of the very successful & proven R44 helicopter line.
long_description:
Description

Exceed Expectations
The ideal blend of proven & innovative engineering. Delivering cutting edge, industry leading & reliable helicopters both for your own travel as well as with customization options for a huge range of missions & applications.

Robinson R44 Operating Performance
The new fuel-injected engine provides higher power for better performance & eliminates the need for carburettor heat. The engine is de-rated to 245 HP for 5 minutes & 205 HP maximum continuous rating, to assure a longer life & lower cost of maintenance. Overall, the Raven II provides a favourable 100 lb increase in the Robinson R44’s gross weight & increased IGE & OGE hover ceilings. Another major enhancement is the reduced noise level of the Raven II. The quieter helicopter features redesigned main & tail rotor blades. Both sets of rotors are fitted with noise attenuating blade tip caps that decrease flyover noise by 1dB. The main rotor blades also have more surface area for increased lifting capability at altitude.

Robinson R44 Versatility
The Raven II is equipped with a fuel-injected, angle-valve, tuned-induction, IO-540 Lycoming engine which produces substantially more power & gives the R44 Raven II greater altitude performance, more payload & increased speed. The Robinson R44 Raven II configuration is also available as an IFR Trainer, Newscopter, Police Helicopter & Clipper II (with floats).

New Robinson R44 Pricing & Delivery
Buying a new Robinson R44 is made easy with Heli Air. Contact our helicopter sales team today for further details about how to buy an R44 & for any friendly, professional advice about which helicopter may suit you best.

title: 2006 Eurocopter EC135 P2 Turbine Helicopter For Sale
short_description: The EC135 P2 is equipped with state-of-the-art avionics & safety features, making it one of the safest & most reliable helicopters on the market today. & with a cruising speed of up to 155 knots & a range of over 300 nautical miles, you can get where you need to go quickly & efficiently.
long_description:
Description

ASI is proud to introduce this outstanding EC135 P2.

Looking for a reliable & versatile helicopter that can transport you & your team to any destination with ease? Look no further than the Eurocopter EC135 P2, built in 2006 & ready to take on any mission.

With seating for up to 5 passengers & 2 crew members, the EC135 P2 is the perfect solution for corporate travel, VIP transport & emergency medical services. & with the optional Cineflex camera system, this helicopter is also ideal for aerial photography & filming.

The EC135 P2 is equipped with state-of-the-art avionics & safety features, making it one of the safest & most reliable helicopters on the market today. & with a cruising speed of up to 155 knots & a range of over 300 nautical miles, you can get where you need to go quickly & efficiently.

So why wait? Contact us today to learn more about the Eurocopter EC135 P2 & how it can meet your aviation needs. Our team of experts is ready to help you take flight & reach new heights!

title: 2002 Eurocopter AS355N Turbine Helicopter (WITHDRAWN)
short_description: The aircraft presents extremely well & has been used for commercial operations in Europe & currently under CAMO. The 12 year inspection was completed in 2015 so good until 2027. The helicopter is equipped with an autopilot along with seating for six. With low total time & good times remaining on all components this aircraft is ready for many years of flying. We can assist with transfer to other European EASA or FAA registration.
